actions.text: Amendment SA 104, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 141.
Amendment SA 104 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S1887) To remove the sunset on modification of work requirement exemptions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 104 proposed by Senator Kennedy.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 104, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 141.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 104, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 141.

purpose: To remove the sunset on modification of work requirement exemptions.
